publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2185 Brian Adam: Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nurseryâ€”That the Parliament commends companies and organisations that provide workplace nursery schemes for the benefit of their employees and their children and condemns the Liberal Democrat/Conservative administration of Aberdeen City Council which has voted to close its workplace nursery.

S2M-2185 Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nursery (lodged on 17 December 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*, Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2185 Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nursery (lodged on 17 December 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Frances Curran*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2185 Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nursery (lodged on 17 December 2004) Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-2185 Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nursery (lodged on 17 December 2004) Rosie Kane*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-2185 Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nursery (lodged on 17 December 2004) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-2185 Closure of Aberdeen City Council Workplace Nursery (lodged on 17 December 2004) Roseanna Cunningham*, Dr Jean Turner*
